meanings.definition: The state or quality of being foolish or irrational.
meanings.sent1: Her constant silliness made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the silliness of comedy shows.
meanings.sent3: The silliness of wearing a winter coat in summer was evident.
meanings.sent4: His decision to quit his job on a whim was pure silliness.
meanings.sent5: The silliness of his actions will be remembered for years.

meanings.definition: Behavior that is amusing or frivolous.
meanings.sent1: The children's silliness brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The silliness of the clown entertained the audience.
meanings.sent3: Their silliness during the game brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The silliness of the situation was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The silliness of their dance routine was infectious.

meanings.sent1: His silliness in spending all his money on toys was regrettable.

meanings.sent3: The silliness of trying to fit a watermelon in his pocket was evident.
meanings.sent4: The silliness of his decision to jump off the swing was alarming.
meanings.sent5: The silliness of his daredevil stunt left everyone speechless.
